#include<stdio.h>
#define max 1000010
#define ll long long
long long int arr[1000010];
int main()
{
ll i,j,s=0,m,n,t;
arr[0]=1;
arr[1]=1;
for(i=2;i<=max;i++)
{
for(j=2*i;j<=max;j+=i)
{
arr[j]=1;
}
}
scanf("%lld",&t);


while(t--){s=0;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&m,&n);
for(i=m;i<=n;i++)
{
if(arr[i]==0)s++;
}

printf("%lld\n",s);
}

return 0;
}
